reviews.text: Love their breakfast sandwiches.  Always a great grab when your in a hurry. Always fresh and hot!
Great sandwiches. Had the chicken salad on everything bagel with red pepper soup. Soup cold. Had them warm it back up. Still cold. Wasn't going to ask a third time. Took it home.
I love this place! Friendly staff, lots of choices, and the best bagels ever. I've had people who've said these bagels are better than anything in NYC. They carry Dr Browns cream soda, too.
The staff was nice , clean and  well  mannered  food area was clean the worker was amazing,  she did a great  job  ...
Omg. Bagels and cinnamon raisin cream cheese . AWESOME

My wife and I ate here for dinner. The only reason for the 4 star rating was that our waitress was not really in any hurry to take care of us. Out side of that the wings were extremely good. We got a meal that came with a pitcher of iced tea, a huge and I mean huge basket of fries, and 20 wings. Very reasonably priced and the wings are so worth it. We will be coming back the next time we are in Buffalo for sure

Pick up a bottle of Duffs sauce for the house and as a gift to send to your friends far away, it's great, especially on the BBQ grille.  I usually only order the fried shrimp basket, but there's no denying that the wings are great and hot. There's a lot more to the menu than just chicken wings just so you know. You'll leave completely stuffed and happy! Take out orders are almost always ready within 10 to 15 minutes.

This place was great. We ordered the special with  20 wings, a large fries, and a large pitcher of soda for $35.00. So much food. We couldn't eat all of it! We got the medium sauce....just spicy enough for us. A definite place we will come back to if we are in the Buffalo NY area

It feels very much like a chain. We walked in while a grade school sports team was there with their parents which affected the atmosphere. Really tasty wings. The double char—something or other, ask about this, was really fantastic. But the spice just wasn’t there on their hottest wings. They advertise over and over, in your face, how dangerous the heat of their wings is. And it’s just not at the level you want it to be if you’re looking for real heat. Staff was nice, and I’d return if I was nearby and craving wings. Although, I’d definitely want to check out more spots nearby first.

Legendary, amazing, always delicious!!! My wife who grew up in East NY cannot believe how awesome the wings are here, anytime we're in the area we make sure to stop at least one time! The service is always super fast and everyone is always friendly!!! We can't wait till we're out this way again to come back!! Or.   You could just open a location out here in the Albany area!!!
No better place for a 3am grilled cheese. Food is pretty cheap, always made fresh, so it's always hot. It takes a little longer than a McDonalds or something, but it's well worth the wait.
Good food. The server is a blonde with glasses. She's a sweet heart. I always try to tip a least $15 dollars.

I have been going to Louie's for years and had good service and food - except for one waitress. I went there on January 28, 2019 around 10pm and the waitress on duty went way out of her way to be incredibly rude several times so it was very intentional (She is their worst waitress). She is the first waitress in my life that I did not give a tip to (And I always give waitresses 20% tips).  I am an easygoing person and not hard to please at all. I doubt I will go back there again. She probably did me a favor in the long run. I need to save money for an upcoming wedding/marriage anyways.

Great food and workers are really friendly. I stop in usually once a week and all the workers know me by name when I call and order my food they know it's me. 2 Hotdogs with everything is one of the best things to order specially with fries with cheese and special sauce
The food was fair. I went in thinking this was another location of Louie's on Sheridan. I like curly fries. Seems they just share a name except they added Texas Red Hots. Pretty confusing.
I sure do love late night trips to mighty taco. Except their drive through speaker. It sounds like somehow a portal to the 70's has been opened. Other than that? Week it up kids. Ya do good.
Tacos were crunchy and they was soft shells. Ok when it's a last minute stop .
Just went through the drive thru but they're always quick and never had a problem with my food!

Food is consistently good. I almost always go in to eat and staff is friendly, dining area and restroom is clean. I dont care for the music they seem to play the last few months, not really a hip hop kind of dining experience but it's not a deal breaker. Just a little loud and annoying. (And no, I'm not old)
I love their chicken fajitas. Delicious.

This place is amazing and the clerks are incredibly helpful and right on the spot with my order. Is very accessible for people with disabilities and they are willing to help bring your orders the table when you're not capable of carry it yourself. It's a fun by vibrant place!

Great coffee shop, right across from a Starbucks, but doing great business. We had spinach-feta omelots that we're improbably delicious, and the coffee was excellent as well. A great place for a cozy breakfast for two for $20.

This place has great coffee and breakfast food items.  The breakfast wrap with sausage or ham is my favorite.  The caramel macchiato is amazing.  They have improved on yelling out names audibly for food orders.   As long as they keep hiring people who can yell names, they will be solid for years to come.

Nice place, very good coffee, but I feel like it's gone down hill the last couple of years.  Doesn't feel like it's a local place anymore. It has become commercially uncomfortable, too many hard wood furniture pieces. Starbuck across the street feels more like a small local coffee shop than this does. I used to love to bring people here from out of town, or meet up with friends to enjoy lunch or a coffee, and sit in comfortable chairs.
Excellent gluten free options! They are mindful of cross contamination. Love the Spot's Chicken Pesto Sandwich on a gluten free roll with salad! Yum!
Meet the owners wife. She was a very nice lady. Had a conversation with her for about 15 mins. Store was nice and clean food was perfect will order again
Had a spicy feta chicken wrap and it was good.
Fish sandwiches are good, especially when 2 for $ 5
Great food got a chicken finger wrap

Overpriced garbage. $14 for a  chicken souvlaki salad with literally ONE slice of cucumber, two slices of tomato and two rings of onion. I called to see if it was a mistake and the very nice girl on the line said no, it's just how it is and apologized. Go somewhere else.

It’s one of my favorite places to go to. Fresh tasty food always. Tacos are tiny but tasteful. I have tried burrito, tacos, nachos, Mac & cheese, along with salads. ALL were delicious. Closes at 2am on Friday night gives it a plus
Best burritos and tacos around. Great customer service and atmosphere.  Been there more than 15 times and never had a bad experience.

Visited this place late in a Friday after a long drive.  It was a busy place.  The line wasn't long but there was a ton of things going on.  It was a little intimidating being our first time there but the food was worth the wait.  The drinks were even better, the cocktail list was very unique and everything was perfect.  It's always fun to watch a bartender that really loves what they are making.  I would recommend this place to anyone.    

On a side note there were a couple families there as well, it's not the most family friendly but if you take your kids you probably won't be the only ones.

Salty AF. The mild/medium salsa(???)/sauce(???) is the worst. It’s a deep brown colour and doesn’t have any flavour other than salt. Pulled pork taco + black bean taco = zero flavour. Crispy fish taco was the best! Staff are really friendly and food comes fast.

Snosberry mules are fantastic, sleeper pick for food is dirty south tacos or burrito, take a bottle of rocket sauce for the road, and always be on the lookout for the food trucks in the summer! Love Lloyd's , major staple if the buffalo food scene!
Delicious and generous sized servings, the b.l.t.t.c. was out standing! We will definitely be back to try dessert!
Had the cheesy chick at Darien Lake, NY.... fantastic!! I had the mac and cheese and a grilled cheese BLT. Best grilled cheese ever! And the staff was sooooo kind and friendly!! Great job⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Delish! Super friendly folks and great twists on classic comfort food! If you see them out & about stop and give ‘em a try!

Awesome High Quality food, with great service and very reasonably priced. This is one of my favorite food truck venues and always seek them out when attending food truck events. Give them a try-you won't be disappointed!!

Went to Larkin Square last night-even though the heat was oppressive the food was great.Had the Buffalo chicken sandwich-it was awesome.
Will be going to Eastern Hills Mall real soon for another.Check it out.

It’s one of my favorite places to go to. Fresh tasty food always. Tacos are tiny but tasteful. I have tried burrito, tacos, nachos, Mac & cheese, along with salads. ALL were delicious. Closes at 2am on Friday night gives it a plus
Best burritos and tacos around. Great customer service and atmosphere.  Been there more than 15 times and never had a bad experience.

Visited this place late in a Friday after a long drive.  It was a busy place.  The line wasn't long but there was a ton of things going on.  It was a little intimidating being our first time there but the food was worth the wait.  The drinks were even better, the cocktail list was very unique and everything was perfect.  It's always fun to watch a bartender that really loves what they are making.  I would recommend this place to anyone.    

On a side note there were a couple families there as well, it's not the most family friendly but if you take your kids you probably won't be the only ones.

Salty AF. The mild/medium salsa(???)/sauce(???) is the worst. It’s a deep brown colour and doesn’t have any flavour other than salt. Pulled pork taco + black bean taco = zero flavour. Crispy fish taco was the best! Staff are really friendly and food comes fast.

Snosberry mules are fantastic, sleeper pick for food is dirty south tacos or burrito, take a bottle of rocket sauce for the road, and always be on the lookout for the food trucks in the summer! Love Lloyd's , major staple if the buffalo food scene!

My daughter and I have been wanting to go here for over a month, finally we stopped. I can honestly say they have the best Asian food I've had in Years. There was nothing in this meal that wasn't fresh, the flavor was perfect and you can tell it was made with care and pride, not just whipped together. I can't wait to return. It was clean and they were helpful in making a choice and very pleasant. The only criticism I could possibly think of is, I wish they'd advertise more. Apparently they have been in this location since before Christmas.. When driving by its very difficult to tell they are even there let alone what it is. I've seen nothing in the local town paper or any place they are there or what they serve. If the owner should read this, please please please advertise. I'm already in love with your foods and it would be awful if you have to close due to no business. I have no doubt at all if you go once, you'll return.

What a wonderful bowl of green curry I had there today.  I love these non-chain restaurants that care about their patrons enough to ask how things were.  I'll be going back and recommending to others.
So so glad that Water Lily Cafe is open again! Love the decor and atmosphere of the new location on Union. And the food is still excellent as always! Great job, Kim and Amy!

Locally owned and definitely a hidden gem, I've been there several times and have yet to find something that doesn't hit that "spot". If you're craving great food, or even want to try something new without stepping out of your comfort zone to much, this is the place!
Excellent food Great service and cozy atmosphere. Food was full of flavor and not lacking anything. Delicious. I will frequently be dining here.
Pizza is always delicious and baked perfectly! The wings and sandwiches are great, too. Although I don't live in Buffalo anymore, I make it a point to get a pizza from here when I'm back home. :)

Pre ordered my food overnight for delivery first thing when they opened. Was called and told they don't deliver to my area, AFTER my money was taken off card. Now I have no money to eat anything for today, and may have to wait 3-5 business days for a refund because "sometimes non deliverable addresses slip through" and they're "working on updating the system." So I'll be going without food until I get my $30 back, as I have no other money to eat with. Thanks for NOTHING.

Spoke to a manager, her response was basically just an apology.
Found blonde hair in my pizza if I can give them a zero I would.  They put to much provolone cheese on it and the steak wasn't all the way done. The steak was so thick you could choke on it.

Ordered 2 pizzas for delivery and was told it would take 45 minutes to an hour to be delivered. 1 hour and 35 minutes later and still no pizza’s. Called multiple times and no one could tell me when it would arrive or why it’s taking so long. They agreed not to charge me for the order. Unfortunately we will not be ordering through them again.
I love this pizza.  Tastes great and they give you allot of food. Only reason for not 5 stars is that the customer service is not always the best.

On our way back to Ohio we stopped by the falls and looked for a pizza place on the way back that we could eat in.  We ordered a "Sheet" for the 7 of us and ate all we could leaving 7 of the 24 pieces behind.  The pizza was excellent, lots of cheese comparable to extra cheese back home.  My only regret was not being able try the traditional pizza or wings.  We saw some employees eating wings and they looked awesome.  Being close to Christmas we were given a bottle of champagne by the owner.  Very friendly place, happy to help out of towners.

I ordered a chicken finger pizza, one half with extra cheese and added broccoli. The slices were big, the pizza was very big, the crust was perfect, the extra cheese half of the pizza was so cheesy and delicious. Delivery was quick and pizza was still hot. 20/10 would recommend. Was so delicious.

Best location for the best food of all the La Nova's. Pizza is delicious and wings are done to your liking. The bbq wings are fantastic. I don't love the location or the parking, but those won't keep me away.

Worse place to order from. We ordered steak fries. When we got the food they gave us seasoned fries. When I called them back the manager was very rude and said that she wasn't going to pay her delivery guy to deliver us something else. After waiting so long we just called and canceled. They need better phone training skills!

Always serving up good food, this place happens to be known (& delivers!) around the world.  
   To locals, it's just another great example of why Buffalo isn't only the Best Wings on Earth, but (not only in my opinion) the best Pizza also. 

    There's 1 or 2 local places I personally like better for either just wings OR just pizza, but as far as both, La Nova takes the cake.  

    La Nova is always consistent, the fork-in-the-road-lot they're on is always full, and the best thing is: they're always ready to serve up a plethora of pizza slice flavors to many people, without having to wait on a new "slice pie" to be made or come out of the oven(as almost everywhere else does too often). 

    If you're not from here, the original  location would be your best bet to not only get an actual taste of the down home local flavors that Buffalo is famous for, but also one of the few places you can experience "real" Buffalo accents & unshy attitudes to go with the food.
The price is much higher than Vietnamese food here (like 3x-4x expensive), yet still acceptable as the food quality is excellent! You will enjoy a happy French dinner here. Recommended!

Food is good whilst price is reasonable.
The time I visited here is for celebrate my boyfriend and I sent email for reservation. However, the owner didn’t confirm me if Bday cake can be prepared even I have sent several emails before I start my trip.....

The food is great and delightful here. Even though it has a higher price than average restaurant here in Danang, but I think it’s worthy to try, and I think I will come back again in the next trip in Danang.
A traditional delicious french restaurant. My wife and I enjoy a romantic dinner here. It is highly recommended.

Good cuisine over priced , quality is good , portions are not consistent with price 
They showed special of the day ! Lobster Bisque which we order ,after few minutes they said it won't be available after 2 hours , for the level price of what they pretend to be ??? 
We pay deliver be careful with over price !

One of my favorite Thai restaurants in Berlin. Food is awesome at good prices. Great choice, mostly crowded (because so good), so you should better make a reservation, especially at the evening / weekend
If one loves Thai food, this is the place to go. I recommend the papaya salad

I have such a wonderful experience at the restaurant. The food is really authentic and definitely "zab". If you are craving for Thai food, this is the place to come. I recommend slow-cooked pork noodle and Som Tum, papaya salad.
Spicy Thai food for very good price. Very tasty Tom Kha Gai. This place is bigger than the other Papaya and seem to serve more options. Great deal for a lunch in this area.

I really enjoy my food here. I ordered Pad Thay with garnelen and Ice Tea. It was really good decision! The food was soooo good!
The Rindfleischsuppe is also delicious! 
They accept card ;)

It's a Nicholson's pub, quite easy to miss (you need to duck under an archway with a doorway somewhat hidden to the side that drops you down a staircase to a cellar dwelling.

Met up with some family friends for dinner who recommended this place; we were shown to a table deep inside the premises and decided to opt for pies. The meal was good, beer fine (a mixture of Nicholson's own and some other guest beers) and service excellent.  I decided to try a pudding, cheesecake with a generous dollop of cream.

The total bill for 4 people for meals plus plenty of beers came to under £100 - excellent value for what we had. Will definitely return if I'm in the area.
Wonderful place. Fabulous premises, great food and brilliant staff. Couldn't have been better and cannot wait to go there again.

Lovely little hideaway with a great atmosphere and eclectic clientele. A good range of reasonably priced wines and ales to suit any taste. Bar staff are polite and helpful. Wheelchair access through a lift

Always a fun place to dine out. Standard pub F&B. Great atmosphere on Friday night. Very busy. Unusual decor too. Reservations recommended. Private parties can take over a larger than usual space so you've been warned! ;-). Good service and happy waiting staff. Thank you. See you again.

An unusual themed bar with so much potential. Great gin selection but if it isn't on the menu,, they can't do cocktails. Interesting Roman meets Egyptian theme but in need of a clean. Thick dust on the light shade over our table, cobwebs on the curtains. A real shame as it could be a great location.

Amazing food, amazing price. My go to meal would be “fungi spaghetti” and special Bulgarian lemonada. You can go both for a quick meal and a proper group meal. Amazing staff too. Very kind and professional.
Very good food. The new atmosphere is very welcoming and comforting. We really enjoyed our meals. I will visit this restaurant again.
Very nice and cosy place. The food is tasty. I of course cannot tell for the whole menu but from what I've tested it was delicious.

I love the interior. Its better than before. The food is awesome too. Dont forget to reservse a table if you want to dine there Friday or Saturday night, because it's always full at these days and that part of the day. It's worth a visit.
Very good service. Lovely lady served us and spoke English.  Good range of food for veggies. Xxx

Always enjoy eating here. One of Fredericton's local favorites.

Awesome warm and friendly atmosphere, fun staff, good local beer selection, and  really great pub fare / comfort food menu.

Overall, a great place to go out for a casual and relaxed dinner or evening meal. Oh, and a great deal on Wednesdays when apps are half price (remember to buy a drink)!

Everything about Snooty warms my heart. The staff are always amazing and friendly. Lots of good beer. They have an upper deck patio in the warmer months and a side room that comfortably fits up to 20 of your homies (I requested said room for my birthday and crammed 20+ in there and it was awesome!) Do yourself a favour and order some Duke Rolls while you're visiting!

A popular pub located in the heart of downtown Fredericton, the Snooty Fox has a reputation for being a great social hangout. If the weather is good you can sit on the roof level of the establishment which is the best choice in the summer. If visiting from out of New Brunswick I recommend trying some of the local brews they offer. Picaroons is always a good choice.
My third  time coming here, and always a good experience. Good food,  good service, and great local beer taps. Always a fun and friendly crowd. A must visit if in Fredericton!
We were a group of 25, and got served fairly quickly. Friendly staff. Good choices on tap.

It’s one of my favorite places to go to. Fresh tasty food always. Tacos are tiny but tasteful. I have tried burrito, tacos, nachos, Mac & cheese, along with salads. ALL were delicious. Closes at 2am on Friday night gives it a plus
Best burritos and tacos around. Great customer service and atmosphere.  Been there more than 15 times and never had a bad experience.

Visited this place late in a Friday after a long drive.  It was a busy place.  The line wasn't long but there was a ton of things going on.  It was a little intimidating being our first time there but the food was worth the wait.  The drinks were even better, the cocktail list was very unique and everything was perfect.  It's always fun to watch a bartender that really loves what they are making.  I would recommend this place to anyone.    

On a side note there were a couple families there as well, it's not the most family friendly but if you take your kids you probably won't be the only ones.

Salty AF. The mild/medium salsa(???)/sauce(???) is the worst. It’s a deep brown colour and doesn’t have any flavour other than salt. Pulled pork taco + black bean taco = zero flavour. Crispy fish taco was the best! Staff are really friendly and food comes fast.

Snosberry mules are fantastic, sleeper pick for food is dirty south tacos or burrito, take a bottle of rocket sauce for the road, and always be on the lookout for the food trucks in the summer! Love Lloyd's , major staple if the buffalo food scene!

I never had Indian Cuisine before. I order the chicken tikka and it was delicious. The place has a nice decor and my server was very nice and polite. If you like Indian cuisine or if you never had it give this place a try.

this best test best services and this most important test like India go this pleas and trying go go go!!!!
better then new Jersey city rasoi taste

Not Only a classy Decor, the food was the best I have had since moving to Hagerstown!, Im a Regular to Indian food, and this place left the other places in Hagerstown Standing !!!! Hands Down, you have to Eat here....

Joy

Fredrick Md
Friendly staff and excellent excellent food.
Closed out of business

Amazing food, the wait is always wrong and servers will always be rushing. Not the best service but for a college student neighborhood it's pretty decent. The Bread and the Omelate was amazing, the biscuit needed the jelly but the Home fries was a great add on. Decent price for the size, more paying for the looks. Food looks exactly like the pictures.

I requested a two-top on the bench (that had previously been a two-top; I watched the previous couple leave and the table get cleaned). I was told by the host to basically shrug off/he was managing his tables, and that, as a caveat, he might ask us to "move" if a 6 top came in. I'm sorry but, excuse me? No. I've worked in restaurants on and off for 15 years and never once said something like that to someone. The tables are so close to each other that you feel like your shoulders are about to graze the people next to you; consider removing even just one two-top and everyone - your customers and your staff - will be a lot more relaxed. What we ordered was bland/under-salted and/or weirdly-seasoned (way too much nutmeg in the biscuits and gravy), and we left paying $50 for an offensive and underwhelming experience.
Food was really tasty. Being a vegan, I always wonder about restaurants and how they address my needs but this one nailed it.
This place is always busy for a reason . They do an excellent job at working the very small space they have. Amazing food and they make their own biscuits.  A true Farm house style breakfast.
The best place to eat breakfast in Berkeley. I love it.

Pizzas are just ok. But the best part is u can get cakes till 1 in night , but the cakes price's are a little high. So if don't have cake for your friends bday you can go and have it even in night. I purchased a chocolate cake, that's given below for about ₹500 for half Kg variant.
Very bad yukk pizza of the town..plz don't eat

Yesterday I eat pizza from here and now I'm in bed due take medicine due to poison of his pizza 
Pls safe your family members
Pls do not take food here because
This is why I love traditional Italian restaurants so much, everything makes you feel welcomed and even it at times is a bit chaotic, it is relaxed and friendly in equal measures.
Great place for delivery especially their pizzas

Beautiful rose garden, well maintained. Do come on weekends. Its located in sector 15. Space for car parking also available. You can enjoy coconut water, various flavor of ice creams, lemon soda. Best time to visit is in evening as it glows various colour full lights there. Lot of fountains with ample sitting space. Best for jogging yoga exercise, whatever you love to do.

The Rose Garden as the name suggest has different varieties of roses white , red, Yellow, orange,pink with a specific scientific name written...
The sizes of roses are also very Big.
The park is large and spread over 30 acres..
The garden is well maintained with good grass..
The trees also beautiful..
It also has a fountain..

Good to spend time here
Moreover eating facilities and washrooms are also available..
A Nala passes in between the park and has bridge to cross over it..

My mom used to come here when she lived in Chandigarh for a while. When I visited, it was nice. However, i noticed that the water (lake) was drained. It did not look very aesthetic. Wish they were fixing it at a different time. The flowers look very beautiful. If you are in Chandigarh, I recommend visiting this garden. It is also a great place for studying or reading (or relaxing in general). I just want to put out a request for people to not damage the flowers and plants. If you are taking photos, please be aware of your surroundings. This is a beautiful place, and we should keep it this way.

Visited during summer vacations and hardly found any rose. Summer definitely not the right time to visit the garden. There is not much greenery also to sit during summer. Recommended for other seasons. Kids did not enjoy much and all we could see was little squirrel 🐿 at entrance. Must be much better place during season other than summer.

Opened in 1967, this place has been one of the scenic beauty types place where you can visit anytime for nice views. The garden is well managed by the managing body. Also if you are one who is very fond of roses and would like to take a look at different varieties of roses, then this is the place for you. Also during the time of valentine's week, there is a rose festival organised here. So visit this place during this time and you will definitely worth it. For the rest of the year, this place is chic and quiet. So a good place for finding peaceful environment for a short time in a day or so
Very nice staff and the food was excellent. Didn't take long to arrive and was hot and fresh. Pretty consistent ordering at Pizza Express. There is a takeaway option also if you need to dash.
Very good pizza. Perfect service. I will come back for sure ;).
Such good food! At first it looks like a fast food restaurant but the food is really good quality and tasty!
Good pizza, slow service.
Delicious food. Friendly, helpful staff.

I have been going to Roy's since I was a kid. It is a true gem in the rough and an interesting dining experience. Finally nearing the end of the menu after 30+ years and I don't regret a single sandwich. There is literally something for everyone.

189 The Mark Big Kessler Sandwich  $15 (5/5 NOMs)
Dam, I just love all these sandwiches at this place. Truly a heaven for all sandwich lovers! Was so soft and tender and very saucy each bite. Mesquite chicken breast, avocado, Swiss cheese, shrimp salad, and golden sauce broiled for

141 Dr Ecker the Checker Sandwich $14 (5/5 NOMs)
Bring me all your nomdwiches. Its hard to pick one best sandwich when they are 220+ sandwiches on the menu. I just opened a page and randomly point. This time fait got me an awesome Honey Roasted Pork with Shrimp Salad. Oh wow this was so good. Super nomnom! Great mix of everything on french toast. They make a gerat shrimp salad here and so far every sandwich with it is very nomnom. You must try this place and if you haven't well then you haven't lived.

#95 The Raunchy Raymond (5/5 NOMs)
My new fav sandwich!!! it was very soft and tender.

As always, fabulously wonderful wine, meal and desserts. Service always excellent and friendly. So glad we were there Saturday evening. So sorry Milo's will be closing in late February. Always a place you can count on for lovely location and a relaxed quieter environment with friends and family for a hit the spot meal with that touch of elegance that's so comfortable.
Delicious food and excellent service. So sad they're closing soon. You should eat here before they close
Prompt friendly service. Nice selection of food. Had salads which were well prepared  and moderately priced. Substitutions were easy.

We were in for dinner on a Friday evening. Very casual atmosphere and we enjoyed the food. My only concern was the chicken pot pie, while delicious, could have been seasoned a bit more. This will be a restaurant we return too.
Gem of a restaurant in an out of the way location. Very unique and creative menu ideas which were very well executed. Service was also excellent.

Awesome food, meat fall off the bone ribs and giant Wings.  All drenched in the sauce of your choice.
Man I tell you, there is nothing that you chose on the menu, that you can go wrong with!!
Sit at the bar and you won't be disappointed by the service.  I don't know where they found all these fine ladies to tend bar here, but all I can say is, "they stay hopping all night long!!"

Four of us stopped for lunch on Saturday about 1pm. The restaurant was busy with about 15 minute wait. Our wait time was spent enjoying the multitude of filling station memorabilia. The food was very good. The staff was very efficient and friendly. It was worth the short wait.

Atmosphere seemed unique. Menu was large and a little all over the place. We shared the cheese curds. Way over priced for the amount received as an app. Then I had the Oriental chicken salad. Dressing was off, not Asian at all. Chicken on the salad was non-existent, all batter and no meat. To top it all off, 40% of my lettuce leaves were rotten. The waitress only came by twice, so I picked out the bad food and tried to eat around it. I won't be back and I will not be recommending it to anyone.
Great service. Great burgers. Fries not as hot as I like. As they do cool quickly.

We scheduled a group event around lunch time. Staff: The staff was awesome and our waitress was on top of it. A++ service. Food: the food is great. I recommend the Filing Station burger with French fries. They also have popcorn for free next to the bar! Building: The dinning area is clean and spaced nicely. Bonus: the burgers have eggs on them and they have a bar! Star rating: 5 stars because the food was priced right, it came out fast for a group of 15 and the service was awesome! I’d give the service 5 stars by itself!
